title: AE脚本-电影片头片尾演职人员字幕介绍滚动效果 Santa’s Little Credit Helper 1.3 + 使用教程
author: 大众脸
content: 该脚本可快速制作演职人员字幕排版动画效果，支持偏亮修改，有多种文字样式可调。v1.3更新内容为修复了尝试从文件加载信用时Windows机器上的“MaskFile”错误，现在可选择要加载的.txt或.tsv文件。
supported_versions: After Effects CC 2019, CC 2018, CC 2017, CC 2015.3, CC 2015, CC 2014

other.脚本介绍英文: Tools for creating & editing card style credits in After Effects. It can be used with the provided Google Docs template to import pre-typed credits or create them from scratch.
